      • createJointNoFactors

        @Internal
public Variable createJointNoFactors(Variable... variables)
        Creates a new variable that combines the domains of this variable with additional variables.

        For use by FactorGraph.join(Variable...). Currently only supported for Discrete variables.

        All variables must be of type Discrete. The domain of the returned variable will be a JointDiscreteDomain with the subdomains in the same order as variables.

        Overrides:
        createJointNoFactors in class Variable
        Parameters:
        variables - specifies at least one additional variables to join with this one. As a convenience, this may begin with this variable, in which case there must be at least one other variable.
